title: How can internet help me in my studies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ooohhh.. Internet can sure help you in a million ways in your studies. •Easy understanding: Okay let's say you have an issue with a topic under calculus, differentiation to be precise. After hours of reading and solving you still don't understand. What you'll do is open Google on any internet connected device and type differentiation in the search bar. You'll see different articles and pdf's relating to the topic and you're good to go. • Bringing visual aids: This is where YouTube comes in. You have a course you don't understand. Open YouTube and type the name of the course e.g differentiation. You'll see different videos and methods on how to solve problems on differentiation and making it easy to answer any question on it. • Vast amount of knowledge: For every search, there are hundreds of search results relating to it giving you hundreds of articles and pdf's to read from instead of relying only on the one being taught in class alone. •Online library: You'll never have to go to library because all the books are in your hands. Most of students visits library for books. But there are many online libraries where you can get millions of books. Yes it’s fine that you may need a decent environment to study a topic. For that purpose libraries are the best but for books internet is the best tool of education. •Improve skills: Last but not the least is improving your own skills. You can improve your educational skills, body language, English communication skills and human behavior skills with the use if internet. So in short use of internet in education is like blessing for us. H.K Olufemi.

Personally, apart from classes I do a lot of self learning from internet. If some concepts aren’t clear from class, I come back and check some videos on YouTube. There is this MIT OpenCourseWare, popularly known as MIT OCW, where you get videos and lecture materials for many courses. Apart from MIT, many other prestigious institutes have open coursewares where you can find lecture materials and video lectures which can be of great help during examinations. I learnt major part of my first year portion from these online material. If you are interested in a particular topic and want to learn more from that field, you can dig in some journals, research articles. There are many sites where you can enroll in online courses, be it any field. These sites help you increase your understanding of your subjects. If you want to learn a completely new subject, you can go ahead and do that. So, internet has lot to offer and how much you would want to use is in your hands. Cheers
